NOTE SHEET FOR PAYMENT OF BILLS/ACCOUNTING ENTRIES/

ADVANCES (KIMS)

1. Note Sheet No {{doc.note_sheet_no}}   (Priority: {{doc.priority}})   (Document Status: {{doc.workflow_state}})
2. Date of Note Sheet {{doc.get_formatted("date_of_note_sheet")}}
3. Name of School/Department {{doc.name_of_schooldepartment}}
4. Item Of Purchase/Expense {{doc.item_of_purchaseexpense}}
5. Name of Supplier {{doc.name_of_supplier}}
6. Purchase Order No {{doc.purchase_order_no}}
7. Date of Purchase Order {{doc.get_formatted("date_of_purchase_order")}}
8. Details of Invoices & P.O.
{%- for row in doc.details_of_enclosed_bills-%} {%- endfor -%}
{{_("Sl.No.")}} {{_("Invoice No.")}} {{_("Invoice Date")}} {{_("Invoice Amount (In Rs.)")}} {{_("Vendor Code")}} {{_("Remarks,IF Any")}}
{{ loop.index }} {{ row.inv_no }} {{ row.get_formatted("invoice_date", doc)}} {{ row.get_formatted("invoice_amount",doc)}} {{ doc.supplier_code}} {{ row.remarks_if_any}}
Total Amount(In Rs.) {{doc.get_formatted("total_amount_in_rs",doc)}}
9. TDS Amount To Be Deducted (In Rs.) {{doc.tds_amount_to_be_deducted_in_rs}}
10. Advance Amount Already Paid (In Rs.) {{doc.advance_amount_already_paid_in_rs}}
11. Net Final Amount To Be Paid (In Rs.) {{doc.net_final_amount_to_be_paid_in_rs}}
Signatures:
